title: Marc_IRL:旧的Minecraft账号不再支持升级!
author: iSteven
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2015-2-11 17:16 编辑 

旧的，未购买的minecraft.net账号不再能升级到够买过的账号了。不过你可以购买或更名到一个未占用的3-16字符账号。

原文:
FAQ: You can no longer upgrade old, unpaid Minecraft accounts to paid accounts. You can buy or change to a 3-16 char name if available.

原文链接:https://twitter.com/Marc_IRL/status/565192391347695616

replies.author: ZombieSon_
replies.txt_content: 请问这是什么意思？？？

replies.txt_content:
ZombieSon_ 发表于 2015-2-11 17:08

以前注册旧的Minecraft账号不能再进行付款了
